DOC.brief_title: Safety Immunogenicity Study Diphtheria , Tetanus , Acellular Pertussis Poliomyelitis Vaccine ( REPEVAX ) Followed 2 Doses Diphtheria , Tetanus Poliomyelitis Vaccine ( REVAXIS ) Subjects 40 Years Age Older
